China: Sui–Former Lý War: Sui conquered and annexed the Early Lý dynasty.
Germany: The Duchy of Gascony was created as a buffer state against the Vascones and the Visigothic Kingdom.
Italy: Byzantine–Sasanian War of 602–628: The Sasanian Empire declared war on Byzantium.
Vietnam: Sui–Former Lý War: Sui conquered Vạn Xuân following a brief rebellion by Hậu Lý Nam Đế.
